entry.title: Sudo Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
entry.content:
æ¼æ´ä¿¡æ¯

æ¼æ´åç§°ï¼š Sudo Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

æ¼æ´ç¼–å·ï¼š

  • CVEï¼š CVE-2025-32463

æ¼æ´ç±»å‹ï¼š æƒé™æå‡

æ¼æ´ç­‰çº§ï¼š é«˜å±

æ¼æ´æè¿°ï¼š CVE-2025-32463æ˜¯SudoäºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæœ¬åœ°æƒé™æå‡æ¼æ´ã€‚è¯¥æ¼æ´å…è®¸æœ¬åœ°ç”¨æˆ·åœ¨ç‰¹å®šé”™è¯¯é…ç½®æˆ–é€šè¿‡ç²¾å¿ƒæ„é€ çš„è¾“å…¥ä¸‹å°†æƒé™æå‡è‡³rootã€‚æ­¤é—®é¢˜ç”±Rich Mirchå‘ç°ã€‚æ”»å‡»è€…å¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨æ­¤æ¼æ´è·å¾—rootè®¿é—®æƒé™ï¼Œå®Œå…¨æ§åˆ¶ç³»ç»Ÿã€‚

äº§å“å‚å•†ï¼š sudo project

äº§å“åç§°ï¼š sudo

æ¥æºï¼š https://github.com/kh4sh3i/CVE-2025-32463

ç±»å‹ï¼š CVE-2025:github search

ä»“åº“æ–‡ä»¶

  • LICENSE
  • README.md
  • exploit.sh
  • img

æ¥æºæ¦‚è¿°

CVE-2025-32463

Local Privilege Escalation to Root via Sudo chroot in Linux

ğŸ›‘ Vulnerability Summary

CVE-2025-32463 is a local privilege escalation vulnerability in the Sudo binary. The flaw allows a local user to escalate privileges to root under specific misconfigurations or with crafted inputs. The issue was discovered by Rich Mirch.

  • CVE-ID: CVE-2025-32463
  • Component: sudo
  • Type: Local Privilege Escalation (EoP)
  • CVSS Score: TBD
  • Discovered by: Rich Mirch

ğŸ”¥ Impact

An attacker with low privileges can exploit this vulnerability to gain root access, compromising the system entirely.

ğŸ§ª Proof of Concept

Exploit

ğŸ›  Requirements

  • Affected version of sudo
  • Local shell access

ğŸ›¡ï¸ Mitigation

  • Update sudo to the latest patched version.
  • Use security frameworks like AppArmor or SELinux to limit sudo behavior.
  • Monitor for abnormal sudo invocations.

ğŸ§· References

  • CVE-2025-32463 on NVD
  • Rich Mirch on Twitter
  • sudo project

âš ï¸ Disclaimer

This PoC is provided for educational and research purposes only. Running this on any system without permission is illegal and unethical.
entry.summary:
æ¼æ´ä¿¡æ¯

æ¼æ´åç§°ï¼š Sudo Local Privilege Escalation Vulnera

entry.title: The Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload (Pro) - WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to
entry.content:
é“¾æ¥ï¼š https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c438-893p-pq8h

CVSS è¯„åˆ†ï¼š 9.8

å‚è€ƒé“¾æ¥ï¼š

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-5746

  • https://www.codedropz.com/woocommerce-drag-drop-multiple-file-upload

  • https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/id/3c1f625e-4456-45e4-8a7f-809b22edb66b?source=cve

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c438-893p-pq8h

æè¿°ï¼š

The Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload (Pro) - WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the dnd_upload_cf7_upload_chunks() function in version 5.0 - 5.0.5 (when bundled with the PrintSpace theme) and all versions up to, and including, 1.7.1 (in the standalone version). This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to upload arbitrary files on the affected siteâ€™s server which may make remote code execution possible. The execution of PHP is disabled via a .htaccess file but is still possible in certain server configurations.
entry.summary: é“¾æ¥ï¼š https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c438-893p-pq8h

entry.title: The Ads Pro Plugin - Multi-Purpose WordPress Advertising Manager plugin for WordPress is
entry.content:
é“¾æ¥ï¼š https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c9gr-fm33-6r9r

CVSS è¯„åˆ†ï¼š 9.8

å‚è€ƒé“¾æ¥ï¼š

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-4689

  • https://codecanyon.net/item/ads-pro-plugin-multipurpose-wordpress-advertising-manager/10275010

  • https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/id/038ddfcd-093b-4234-a0b8-a3bf9a3d329f?source=cve

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c9gr-fm33-6r9r

æè¿°ï¼š

The Ads Pro Plugin - Multi-Purpose WordPress Advertising Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Local File Inclusion which leads to Remote Code Execution in all versions up to, and including, 4.89. This is due to the presence of a SQL Injection vulnerability and Local File Inclusion vulnerability that can be chained with an image upload. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to execute code on the server upload image files on the server than can be fetched via a SQL injection vulnerability, and ultimately executed as PHP code through the local file inclusion vulnerability.
entry.summary: é“¾æ¥ï¼š https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c9gr-fm33-6r9r

entry.title: Apache Dubbo ååºåˆ—åŒ–æ¼æ´
entry.content:
æ¼æ´ä¿¡æ¯

æ¼æ´åç§°ï¼š Apache Dubbo ååºåˆ—åŒ–æ¼æ´

æ¼æ´ç¼–å·ï¼š

  • CVEï¼š CVE-2019-17564

æ¼æ´ç±»å‹ï¼š ååºåˆ—åŒ–

æ¼æ´ç­‰çº§ï¼š ä¸¥é‡

æ¼æ´æè¿°ï¼š Apache Dubbo 2.7.0è‡³2.7.4ã€2.6.0è‡³2.6.7ä»¥åŠæ‰€æœ‰2.5.xç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸­å­˜åœ¨ååºåˆ—åŒ–æ¼æ´ï¼ŒåŸå› æ˜¯æ¥å—HTTP POSTè¯·æ±‚ä¸­çš„ä¸å—ä¿¡ä»»çš„Javaå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå¦‚æœå¯ç”¨äº†HTTPï¼Œæ”»å‡»è€…å¯ä»¥å®Œå…¨æ§åˆ¶Providerå®ä¾‹ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨æ­¤æ¼æ´éœ€è¦æ”»å‡»è€…å‘é€æ¶æ„çš„Javaå¯¹è±¡ã€‚

äº§å“å‚å•†ï¼š Apache

äº§å“åç§°ï¼š Dubbo

å½±å“ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š 2.5.x, 2.6.0 <= version <= 2.6.7, 2.7.0 <= version <= 2.7.4

æ¥æºï¼š https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12444

ç±»å‹ï¼š projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

æ¥æºæ¦‚è¿°

Description:

Apache Dubbo versions 2.7.0 to 2.7.4, 2.6.0 to 2.6.7, and all 2.5.x versions contain an insecure deserialization caused by accepting untrusted Java objects in HTTP POST requests, letting attackers fully compromise a Provider instance if HTTP is enabled, exploit requires attacker to send malicious Java object.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/fairyming/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Dor-Tumarkin/CVE-2019-17564-FastJson-Gadget
  • https://github.com/Exploit-3389/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Hu3sky/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Jaky5155/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/r00t4dm/CVE-2019-17564

KEV: True

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and wonâ€™t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

æ¼æ´ä¿¡æ¯

æ¼æ´åç§°ï¼š Apache Dubbo ååºåˆ—åŒ–æ¼æ´

entry.content:

æ¼æ´åç§°ï¼š Cisco IOS Smart Install Buffer Overflow Vulnerability

æ¼æ´ç¼–å·ï¼š

  • CVEï¼š CVE-2018-0171

æ¼æ´ç±»å‹ï¼š ç¼“å†²åŒºæº¢å‡º

æ¼æ´ç­‰çº§ï¼š ä¸¥é‡

æ¼æ´æè¿°ï¼š Cisco IOSå’ŒIOS XEè½¯ä»¶ä¸­çš„Smart InstallåŠŸèƒ½å­˜åœ¨ç¼“å†²åŒºæº¢å‡ºæ¼æ´ï¼Œç”±äºå¯¹Smart Installæ•°æ®åŒ…çš„ä¸å½“éªŒè¯ï¼Œæœªç»è®¤è¯çš„è¿œç¨‹æ”»å‡»è€…å¯é€šè¿‡å‘TCPç«¯å£4786å‘é€ç‰¹åˆ¶çš„Smart Installæ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œè§¦å‘è®¾å¤‡é‡å¯ã€æ‰§è¡Œä»»æ„ä»£ç æˆ–å¯¼è‡´æ— é™å¾ªç¯ã€‚

äº§å“å‚å•†ï¼š Cisco

äº§å“åç§°ï¼š Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software

æœç´¢è¯­æ³•ï¼š cpe:â€cpe:2.3:o:cisco:iosâ€

æ¥æºï¼š https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12325

ç±»å‹ï¼š projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

æ¥æºæ¦‚è¿°

Description:

Cisco IOS and IOS XE Software contain a buffer overflow caused by improper validation of Smart Install packet data, letting unauthenticated remote attackers trigger device reload, execute arbitrary code, or cause indefinite loops, exploit requires sending crafted Smart Install message on TCP port 4786.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/6d4b443f23fc
  • https://github.com/AlrikRr/Cisco-Smart-Exploit
  • https///github.com:AlrikRr/Cisco-Smart-Exploit.git

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:o:cisco:ios"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and wonâ€™t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: Apache Tomcat HTTP/2 DoS Vulnerability

æ¼æ´ç¼–å·ï¼š

  • CVEï¼š CVE-2025-31650

æ¼æ´ç±»å‹ï¼š æ‹’ç»æœåŠ¡

æ¼æ´ç­‰çº§ï¼š é«˜å±

æ¼æ´æè¿°ï¼š Apache Tomcat HTTP/2 DoSæ¼æ´ï¼ˆCVE-2025-31650ï¼‰å…è®¸æ”»å‡»è€…é€šè¿‡å‘é€ç•¸å½¢çš„priorityå¤´æ¥è§¦å‘å†…å­˜è€—å°½æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œå½±å“Apache Tomcatçš„å¤šä¸ªç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚æ­¤æ¼æ´å¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´æœåŠ¡ä¸å¯ç”¨ã€‚

äº§å“å‚å•†ï¼š Apache

äº§å“åç§°ï¼š Apache Tomcat

å½±å“ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼š 9.0.76 â€“ 9.0.102, 10.1.10 â€“ 10.1.39, 11.0.0-M2 â€“ 11.0.5

æ¥æºï¼š https://github.com/B1gN0Se/Tomcat-CVE-2025-31650

ç±»å‹ï¼š CVE-2025:github search

ä»“åº“æ–‡ä»¶

  • PoC.py
  • README.md

æ¥æºæ¦‚è¿°

TomcatKiller - CVE-2025-31650

ğŸš¨ Proof of Concept (PoC) for Apache Tomcat HTTP/2 DoS vulnerability (CVE-2025-31650)

This script triggers a memory exhaustion condition in Apache Tomcat by sending malformed priority headers over HTTP/2.

ğŸ¯ Affected Versions

  • Apache Tomcat 9.0.76 â€“ 9.0.102
  • Apache Tomcat 10.1.10 â€“ 10.1.39
  • Apache Tomcat 11.0.0-M2 â€“ 11.0.5

âš™ï¸ Features

  • âœ”ï¸ HTTP/2 support verification
  • âœ”ï¸ Server header inspection (detect Tomcat)
  • âœ”ï¸ --check-only mode (non-intrusive)
  • âœ”ï¸ Async-based scalable exploit with adjustable intensity

ğŸš€ Usage

âœ… Check-only (safe detection)

ğŸ’¥ Exploit (DoS)

ğŸ§© Arguments

ParameterDescription
--targetFull target URL with protocol and port
--check-onlyOnly test if the server supports HTTP/2 & Tomcat
--exploitRun the actual DoS attack
--tasksNumber of async tasks (default: 50)
--requestsRequests per task (default: 5000)

âš ï¸ Disclaimer

This PoC is for educational and authorized security testing only.
Do not use it against systems without explicit permission.
